message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it incredibly valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the value of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. How about $950,000? This leaves some room for both of us to feel good about the deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can make this work for us both. I am willing to pay $925,000 for the product.
